mapper.select: SELECT D.DEP_NO, D.DEP_NAME, D.DEP_STATE, E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME FROM DEP D LEFT JOIN EMP E ON D.DEP_NO = E.DEP_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEP (DEP_NO, DEP_NAME, DEP_STATE) VALUES (#{depNo}, #{depName}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT d.DEP_NAME , d.DEP_NO , e.EMP_NAME FROM emp e JOIN DEP d ON e.DEP_NO = d.DEP_NO LEFT JOIN AUTH b ON e.AUTH_NO =b.AUTH_NO WHERE e.AUTH_NO NOT IN ('NO00A') ORDER BY e.TIER_NO
